backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor and a large Types module containing data structures for technologies, devices, components, and related game entities. Includes storage mixins and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Contains old type definitions and structures used for upgrading canister state and migrating persisted data. Provides compatibility mappings for legacy saved-game formats.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, configuring colors and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the SPA root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, main layout, and page routes for the application with theme support and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Implements a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting for user name and saving a new profile via mutation with basic validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/layout/GameLayou: Layout wrapper that shows navigation, page content, and triggers profile setup modal when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/nav/MainNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing company branding, route links, and login state with user greeting.
frontend/src/features/branding/LogoCreat: Interactive form for generating and customizing SVG logos with configurable text, colors, and shapes.
frontend/src/features/branding/logoFallb: Generates fallback initials and SVG logo when no custom logo exists.
frontend/src/features/branding/logoGener: Builds SVG logos from configuration including shapes, gradients, and initials; defines default config.
frontend/src/features/branding/LogoRende: Displays a provided SVG logo or generates a fallback based on name and renders it using innerHTML.
frontend/src/features/cloud-saves/SaveSl: UI panel for creating, loading, and renaming cloud save slots, integrating game state and toasts.
frontend/src/features/competitors/Compet: Displays competitor cards with stats like cash, market share, and strength.
frontend/src/features/competitors/compet: Zustand store managing competitor list with initialization and update methods.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/bestProd: Provides utilities for categorizing products, scoring them, filtering by year/category, and determining yearly winners.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/BestProd: Displays yearly best products per category, allowing year selection and showing winners with scores and logos.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/MetricsP: Renders static business metrics with trend indicators and a progress bar for R&D.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/released: Creates released product objects from blueprint data and exposes helpers for category extraction and logo retrieval.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Blue: Lists device blueprints with key specs and supports releasing them or opening them for editing.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/desi: Defines available design presets per device category with names, styles, and icons.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Desi: Shows selectable design options for a device category with a preview and design metadata.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/devi: Generates a default device blueprint object with preset hardware and feature fields.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Devi: Form-based editor to create device blueprints, handling fields, validation, and save actions.
frontend/src/features/investments/Invest: UI panel for performing investments such as store building, acquisitions, marketing, and recruitment with validation and cash updates.
Displays a scrollable history of past investments with icons, amounts, descriptions, and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/investments/invest: Zustand store managing a persisted list of investments with an addInvestment method that prepends capped entries.
Shows a scrollable feed of market events with icons, titles, descriptions, and impact details.
frontend/src/features/market/marketFeedS: Zustand store for market events with an addEvent method that prepends capped entries.
frontend/src/features/new-game/difficult: Defines starting cash and difficulty modifiers for normal and challenging game modes.
frontend/src/features/new-game/NewGameMo: Modal for creating a new game, selecting difficulty, entering company branding, and initializing game state.
frontend/src/features/office/Office3DVie: Renders a 3D office scene using react-three-fiber based on current office level.
frontend/src/features/office/officeScene: Provides preset 3D scene configurations for office levels including lighting, floor colors, and furniture.
frontend/src/features/office/officeStore: Zustand store tracking office level and upgrade cost with logic to increase both on upgrade.
frontend/src/features/office/OfficeUpgra: UI panel showing office level stats and allowing upgrades if the player has enough cash.
frontend/src/features/products/releaseMo: Utility functions applying productivity and attraction modifiers to cost, sales, and rating.
frontend/src/features/products/ReleasePr: Modal for configuring and releasing a product, calculating costs, bonuses, and creating a released product record.
frontend/src/features/research/ResearchD: Displays detailed research info and allows starting research if requirements are met and funds are available.
frontend/src/features/research/ResearchL: Searchable, filterable list of technologies that opens a detail panel for selected items.
frontend/src/features/research/techDatas: Generates a large mock dataset of technology entries with categories, effects, costs, and requirements.
frontend/src/features/simulation/simulat: Zustand-powered simulation loop that advances days, initializes competitors, and triggers random market events.
frontend/src/features/stores/storeNetwor: Defines store network data, creation helpers, bonuses, validation, and store-building utilities.
Zustand store managing the store network state, persistence, and store-building actions.
frontend/src/features/stores/StoreNetwor: Panel summarizing store network counts, bonuses, and store locations.
frontend/src/features/stores/StoresBuild: UI card to select a country and build a store, showing costs and bonuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actors with identity-based refetching using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for backend operations like profiles, blueprints, technologies, research, and saves.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CloudSavesPage.tsx: Cloud saves UI requiring authentication and showing save slots or login prompt.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitorsMarketPage: Page displaying competitor list and market feed within tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard showing game metrics, simulation controls, store summary, and product stats.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceStudioPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface for editing and listing device blueprints with selectable blueprint IDs.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentsPage.tsx: Displays investment actions, store network summary, and an investments log in a three-column layout.
frontend/src/pages/OfficePage.tsx: Shows office upgrades and a 3D office viewer in a split layout with a header.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPage.tsx: Renders the research page header and a list of available research items.
frontend/src/state/gameState.ts: Zustand store managing game state, released products, branding, and related update/reset helpers with persistence.
frontend/src/state/saveGameStore.ts: Zustand store for current save ID and local store network with persistence and reset support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the gameâ€™s features, state, versioning, and tracked requirements.
